query.name: logicapp-logicapp
query.query:
AzureDiagnostics
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(60d) 
 | summarize TimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated) by resource_runId_s, startTime_t, resource_workflowName_s
 |join (
 AzureDiagnostics 
 ) on resource_runId_s, TimeGenerated 
 | project TimeGenerated, resource_workflowName_s, resource_runId_s, Resource, startTime_t, endTime_t, OperationName, error_message_s, status_s

query.name: adf-adftrigger
query.query:
ADFTriggerRun 
| project 
TimeGenerated 
, TriggerName
, TriggerId 
, Category 
, Type
, Start 
, Status
, Parameters
| extend ScheduleTime = tostring(parse_json(Parameters).ScheduleTime)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(60d)

query.name: adf-adffull
query.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| project TimeGenerated , triggerName_s , triggerId_s , SystemParameters_TriggerId_s , Parameters_TriggerTime_t , Parameters_ScheduleTime_t , pipelineName_s , pipelineRunId_g , Category , ResourceType , activityName_s , start_t , end_t , activityType_s , status_s , Output_rowsRead_d , Output_rowsCopied_d , Input_sink_preCopyScript_s , Input_storedProcedureName_s, Error_details_s , Error_errorCode_s , Error_failureType_s , Error_message_s , Output_billingReference_billableDuration_s
| where TimeGenerated > ago(60d) and ResourceType == 'FACTORIES'

query.name: aas-aasdiagnostic
query.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| project 
ResourceProvider
,ResourceType
,ResourceGroup
,SubscriptionId
,TenantId
,SourceSystem
,concat
,Resource
,ServerName_s
,OperationName
,TimeGenerated
,name_s
,value_s
| where TimeGenerated > ago(60d) and ResourceProvider == 'MICROSOFT.ANALYSISSERVICES'

query.name: adf-adfpipeline
query.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| project 
TimeGenerated 
, RunId 
, Status
, SystemParameters
, PipelineName
, Category 
, Type 
, Start 
, End 
, EventMessage
| extend TriggerId = tostring(parse_json(SystemParameters).TriggerId)
| extend SubscriptionId = tostring(parse_json(SystemParameters).SubscriptionId)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(60d)

query.name: logicapp-logicappheader
query.query:
AzureDiagnostics
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(60d) 
 | summarize TimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated) by resource_runId_s, startTime_t, resource_workflowName_s
 |join (
 AzureDiagnostics 
 ) on resource_runId_s, TimeGenerated 
 | project TimeGenerated, resource_workflowName_s, resource_runId_s, Resource, startTime_t, endTime_t, OperationName, error_message_s, status_s

query.name: adf-adfactivity
query.query:
ADFActivityRun 
| project 
TimeGenerated 
, PipelineName 
, PipelineRunId 
, ActivityRunId 
, Category 
, Type
, ActivityName 
, Start
, End 
, ActivityType 
, Status
, Input
, Output
, Error
, ErrorCode
, ErrorMessage 
| extend RowsCopied = tostring(parse_json(Output).rowsCopied) 
| extend RowsRead = tostring(parse_json(Output).rowsRead) 
| extend CopyDuration = tostring(parse_json(Output).copyDuration) 
| extend StoredProcedureName = tostring(parse_json(Input).storedProcedureName) 
| extend PipelineReferenceName = tostring(parse_json(Input).Pipeline.referenceName)
| extend PreCopyScript = tostring(parse_json(Input).sink.preCopyScript)
| extend ErrorDetail = tostring(parse_json(Error).details)
| extend ErrorCode = tostring(parse_json(Error).errorCode)
| extend ErrorType = tostring(parse_json(Error).failureType)
| extend Errormessage = tostring(parse_json(Error).message)
